#include <iostream>
#include <stdlib.h>
#include <algorithm>
#include <vector>

using namespace std;
vector<int> myvec;
vector<int>::iterator iter;
bool cmp(int i,int j)
{
     return i>j;
}
int main()
{
    int cases=0,n=0,k=0,g=0,count=0;long long int sum=0,i=0;
    scanf("%d",&cases);
    while(cases--)
    {
                  scanf("%d %d",&n,&k);
                  for(i=0;i<n;i++){
                                   scanf("%d",&g);
                  myvec.push_back(g);
                  
                  }
                  sort(myvec.begin(),myvec.end(),cmp);

                  for(iter=myvec.begin();count<k;iter++)
                  {
                                                        
                                  sum+=(*iter);
                                  count++;
                  }
                  printf("%lld\n",sum);
                  sum=0;
                  count=0;
                  myvec.clear();
    }
    return 0;
}
